verbose_text: In the present study, following celecoxib treatment in SGC-7901 cells, p-Akt, or activated Akt, was distinctly downregulated, leading to the upregulation of caspase-8 and -9 mRNA expression and increased procaspase-8 and -9 activation.
evidence: p-Akt, or activated Akt, was distinctly downregulated, leading to the upregulation of caspase-8
